name: Rushabh Walke
about: I am a final-year undergraduate student at IIT Kharagpur. I am proficient in C++, SQL, Python, Data Structure and Algorithms, Data Science, Machine Learning, NLP, and Deep Learning. Good in teamwork and management. And have a passion for Data, Machine Learning, Coding and Problem-solving. I have done a Software Development Intern and a data science Intern.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: â€¢ Transformed over 30+ webpages using an automated workflow, optimizing the conversion process for efficiency into a user-friendly app â€¢ Efficiently extracted 90% of relevant data from HTML using Selenium and BeautifulSoup, widely-used tools for optimal web scrapingâ€¢ Utilized html_to_json to transform scraped HTML into structured JSON, enabling convenient manipulation and analysis of the dataâ€¢ Ensured optimal app template generation by employing Chrome Web Driver to conduct in-depth element analysis on JSON dataâ€¢ Processed JSON data has a success rate of 95% for converting web elements into block format for seamless transfer to app templates
experience.description_html: â€¢ Transformed over 30+ webpages using an automated workflow, optimizing the conversion process for efficiency into a user-friendly app â€¢ Efficiently extracted 90% of relevant data from HTML using Selenium and BeautifulSoup, widely-used tools for optimal web scrapingâ€¢ Utilized html_to_json to transform scraped HTML into structured JSON, enabling convenient manipulation and analysis of the dataâ€¢ Ensured optimal app template generation by employing Chrome Web Driver to conduct in-depth element analysis on JSON dataâ€¢ Processed JSON data has a success rate of 95% for converting web elements into block format for seamless transfer to app templates

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: â€¢ Conducted in-depth analysis of Covid-year-wise data for diverse cities, leveraging Matplotlib and sewage waste testing techniquesâ€¢ Executed a systematic assessment of Covid rates by city tier, considering regional population distribution, using advanced techniques.â€¢ Effectively depicted 92% errors at specific pipe sections with distance, designed a visual tool using Turtle to draw a mini pipeline model â€¢ Generated 16 comprehensive reports on pipe characteristics, implementing an integrated algorithm using Python, HTML, CSS, and Jinja â€¢ Achieved 84% accurate predictions through data analysis, visualization, and reporting, providing valuable insights for decision-making

honors_and_awards.title: Best Fresher Award
honors_and_awards.description: Kshitij is the fest organise by Indian Institute of Technology Kharaghpur. It is biggest technology management fest in whole Aisa . As it's an technological fest many events were organise in this fest, one of those event was 'Zenith' organise by Robotics society of IIT Kharaghpur . Creating a non- autonomous robot and competing in such a huge competition was great experience.
